title: Mobile-Based Health Education for Enhancing Workplace Well-Being

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of health management concepts
context.additional_context: Customized wellness education reflecting the work environment characteristics of employees. Conducted in a BYOD (Bring Your Own Device) setting.

learning_goals: Learners can explain the core principles of the four key wellness domains (physical, mental, social relationships, and work-life balance) with over 85% accuracy.
Learners can develop three or more personalized wellness action plans and write weekly implementation reports.
Learners achieve an average improvement of 15% or more when comparing pre- and post-wellness indicator survey scores.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
